version_name: 2.1 is the ability to view your favorite Halo news and blog content directly within the Halo Channel app. Plus

version_description:
This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

• Spartan Companies are now accessible in app including Company Stats and Company Commendations.
• This release also includes various minor bug fixes.
